title: What's up with minions lately?
body: All the minions trying to hustle me when I want to farm lane is pretty annoying lately, Why is the minion block so strong these last few patches? And also minion aggro seems... off. It can be rare but there's an issue where ranged minions just won't reset and will constantly harass me until I kill them. Just yesterday I was testing how far the minions would actually chase me and they ended up following me into tower. I don't really know where I'm going with this but I just wanted to see if anyone else has noticed the aggro problems.

replies.body:
I get what you're saying. I come to lane, one of the caster minions gives me the stink eye and pegs me with annoying laser beams until it dies, no matter what is attacking it.

And the minions move around to chump block me and do stupid shit. It's getting to me.
They can follow you across the map if you do it correctly.
I had quite a few games where one of the melee minions would completely stop in the middle of the lane and stand still not moving or attacking until it died...
The minions can help in some ways, like they can protect you from {{champion:53}}'s pull if they're your minions. But I agree, they ARE getting buggy. I saw one glitched in a wall.

Dude there is actually something fucked up about the minions lately.

The Cannons keep on bugging out, there'll be times where they just sit behind the wave and just kinda shake on the spot and I've had Cannons lately switching targets between every auto.

And the goddamned minion blocking omg

your not wrong the minions have had their collision boxes drastically increased in the recent patches i assume its to further pronounce the benefits of having no collision with minions, like {{item:3046}} or {{summoner:6}} . 

as for the aggro i haven't noticed it that much (i main support tho) i suspect its to increase the impact that minions will have now that they have been patched to be buffed dependent on team champion level.  

Rip late game comebacks
